Plotting Template EstimatorÂ¶

An example plot of skltemplate.template.TemplateEstimator

Out:

/home/utilisateur/skcontrib-id-estimators/examples/plot_template.py:17: UserWarning: Matplotlib is currently using agg, which is a non-GUI backend, so cannot show the figure.
  plt.show()


import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from skltemplate import TemplateEstimator

X = np.arange(100).reshape(100, 1)
y = np.zeros((100, ))
estimator = TemplateEstimator()
estimator.fit(X, y)
plt.plot(estimator.predict(X))
plt.show()

Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 0.105 seconds)

Download Python source code: plot_template.py

Download Jupyter notebook: plot_template.ipynb
